name: Swiss Finance Council
goal: The Swiss Finance Council (SFC) represents internationally active Swiss financial institutions. We provide a platform for our members where they can share their experience, expertise and knowledge as well as advocate their common interests with one voice.
interests: Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
•MiFID II
•European Market Infrastructure Regulation (EMIR)
•Banking Union
•Key developments in taxation policies
•Structural Reforms
•The Bank Recovery and Resolution Directive
